title: I can't log into my client
body: I uninstalled and reinstalled league of legends and it still won't let me sign in. The username and password are correct. It just says authenticating for a very long time.

replies.body: Getting hung on that authentication step is a pretty good sign that your network isn't able to reach the login servers to verify your information. We may just need to mess with some of your network settings, so let's be sure to go through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to hit all the typical fixes.
I'm being hit with this problem except I don't even get to authenticating. My password and username are apparently incorrect even though I can use them to sign into the website.
Love when riot posts these when its on riots end every time.
